message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've given this some thought, and I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
